title: If the slum rehabilitation site fronts on one or more roads, every side abutting on such roads shall be treated as front side & marginal distances prescribed below for such front side shall apply
clause_text: If the slum rehabilitation site fronts on one or more roads, every side abutting on such roads shall be treated as front side & marginal distances prescribed below for such front side shall apply. The front marginal distance shall be measured from the proposed road widening line in the plot, if any.
section: Relaxation in Building and Other Requirements
